title: What is latest technology in commercial laundry business? - Quora

response.answer_text: 1.RFID Enabled To deal with hundreds of thousands of textiles. companies have started using Radio Frequency ID tags. They are computer chips embedded in linens and other items to streamline inventory and make things more efficient and cost effective for everyone. 2.Washing Capsules Computer controls monitor load sizes up to 600 pounds and select the optimum amount and temperature of water for a perfect wash every time. 3.Over-dry Prevention Technology (OPT) Offers unmatched levels of accuracy, resulting in a pinpoint dryness reading throughout the entire load. This helps eliminate over-drying, increases throughput and reduces utility consumption. It offers 30 programmable drying cycles.
